verses.roman:
bhaye kampa haila, mora netre vahe jala
gadgada vāṇī, roma uṭhila sakala

synonyms: bhaye—out of fear; kampa—shivering; haila—there was; mora—my; netre—in the eyes; vahe—flow; jala—tears; gadgada—faltering; vāṇī—voice; roma—body hair; uṭhila—stood up; sakala—all.
translation: "I shivered in fear and shed tears. My voice faltered, and all the hairs on my body stood up.
